value: Teaching isn't just about presenting information to be memorized. To support comprehensive learning, this page offers games that encourage exploration and discovery of the world around us.
The games can be updated at any time.

content.value: Couting: These games aim to reinforce the learning of decimal numbers from different cultures.

value.name: Translation game:
value.desc: Explore numbers from different cultures through an engaging translation game.

value.name: Memory game:
value.desc: Enhance your understanding of number sequences with our interactive memory game.

value.name: Sequence game (Part I):
value.desc: In this first stage, we reinforce your understanding of numerical sequences by focusing on orders up to the tens.

value.name: Sequence game (Part II):
value.desc: Building on the first stage, we advance to working with sequences that extend up to the billionth order, teaching you with increasingly numerical patterns.
